From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


2024 Indian Hindi action thriller film


TehranDirected byArun GopalanWritten byRitesh ShahAshish P. VermaProduced byDinesh VijanStarringJohn AbrahamManushi ChhillarNeeru BajwaCinematographyIevgen GubrebkoEvgeniy GubrenkoEdited bySubham DashAkshay GvaalProductioncompaniesMaddock FilmsBake My Cake FilmsRelease date
26 April 2024 (2024-04-26)
CountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Tehran is an upcoming Indian Hindi-language action thriller film directed by Arun Gopalan and produced by Dinesh Vijan. It stars John Abraham, Manushi Chhillar and Neeru Bajwa.[1] The film is claimed to be based on true events.[2]


Cast[edit]
John Abraham
Manushi Chhillar
Neeru Bajwa
Production[edit]
The movie was announced on 11 July 2022 by the makers through an announcement video featuring the first look of John Abraham from the film.[3][4] On 19 July 2022 Manushi Chhillar was announced as the leading female actor of the film.[5][6] Manushi joined the casting in July 2022.[7][8]
Principal photography commenced in July 2022.[9][10] Filming began on 11 July 2022 in Tehran, Iran.[11] The second schedule began in August 2022 and the third schedule began in September.[12] Filming wrapped up in October 2022.[13] The film has been extensively shot in Glasgow, Mumbai and Delhi.[14][15][16]

Release[edit]
Tehran is scheduled to theatrically released on 26 April 2024.[17]
